alert.note: Alert for Ransom; Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 29 at 7:02AM CDT until September 29 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ransom County in southeastern North Dakota... Northwestern Richland County in southeastern North Dakota... Eastern Sargent County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 745 AM CDT. * At 702 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Forman, or 50 miles west of Wahpeton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milnor, Forman, Wyndmere, Rutland, De Lamere, McLeod and Barney. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 26 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
